product_title: Five angle clear Coke glass set 6 piece

detail.name: Five angle clear Coke glass set 6 piece

details.description_text: • Five angle clear Coke glass set 6 piece• Model: W005• Category: Kitchen & Dining>Drinkware>Everyday GlasswareThis makes them ideal to serve drinks to your guests in style and class!- Tempered or toughened glassware for maximum safety of food service professionals as well as for the superior resistance and durability Whether you prefer your favorite drink on the rocks, with a twist, or neat, you are bound to love this set of four premium quality, large drinking whiskey glasses. They have wide mouth allows you to pour your drink and add your ice effortlessly! Each tumbler flaunts thick shape which is easy to grab made from finest quality of glass, it has light weight construction with thick base gives it strong hold on surface Can be safely used in the microwave, oven, fridge, freezer and dishwasher and non-porous glass will not absorb stains or odors.Designed to release the full flavour and aroma of spirits for an optimal sensory experience- Dishwasher safe and Refrigerator safe. Deep freeze safe.Clean the glasses easily with your dishwasher or by hand. The glasses stay nice and bright even after frequent use!- Microwave safe (unless chipped, broken - Maximum 70 degree celsius) This drinking glass set is an excellent gift for any occasion. The perfect gift for Christmas, Birthday, Wedding Anniversary, Valentine's day, Father's day, Mother's day, Housewarming, College Graduation, St. Patrick's day, Job Promotion, and secret Santa gifts!

details.description_text: Shaon Store Product Name: Onetime Cup/Onetime Glass/Onetime Plastic Glass Product Type: Water Glass/One Time water Glass Capacity: 250 ml Quantity: Set 1- 25 Pieces Quantity: Set 2- 50 Pieces Quantity: Set 3- 100 Pieces Quantity: Set 4- 200 Pieces Quantity: Set 5- 500 Pieces One-time glasses are commonly used in settings where convenience is a priority, such as at outdoor events, parties, and festivals. They can also be useful in situations where cleaning and sanitation may be difficult or impractical, such as in busy food service establishments. One-time glasses are also used in settings where cleaning and sanitation may be difficult or impractical, such as in busy food service establishments. They can be particularly useful for serving drinks in locations where there is limited access to washing facilities, such as at outdoor concerts or in public parks. It's important to note that the use of disposable products like one-time glasses can have negative environmental impacts, as they contribute to waste and pollution. details.description_text: Material: Made of high quality 18/10 food-grade safe stainless steel, BPA FREE and NO TOXINS. Easy to clean and dishwasher safe. Brushed Finish: Hand polished brushed stainless steel finish, build to resist daily scratches, corrosions and tarnishing. Strong and Durable: This heavy duty metal cup resist rust and dents. Its sturdy enough to hold its shape. No rusting, no curled lip for gunk to collect in. Great for serving chilled water, juices, iced tea, milk. Perfect replacement for glass cups or bottles. Ideal for camping, backpacking, traveling, hiking, picnic, at the beach, and other outdoor or indoor activities. STAINLESS STEEL GLASSThese New Silver and Ice touch Wide mouth Glass set of Six is beautifully designed to add grace to your dining experience. As it’s perfect for serving lemonade, water, juice, etc; It has capacity of ml each and these glasses can be used at Home & Restaurants. You can also gift it to your friends or colleagues. It’s made of 100% food grade stainless steel making it highly durable, non-breakable and resistance to corrosion and comes with a Lifetime Guarantee on manufacturing defect.
